measure.name: Reduce Lighting Power Density
measure.description: This measure removes all existing lighting objects from spaces recognized as primary or secondary school space types. New lighting will be added based on the 50% Small to Medium Office AEDG recommendations.
measure.modeler_description: Lighting in un-recognized spaces will be left alone. This measure will attempt to retain schedules from the initial model. If the initial model contained multiple lights associated with multiple schedules, then one of those schedules will be picked for the new lights.
